about_the_game:
Time, Dr. Freeman? Is it really that time again?

Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode One is a community-made adaptation of Valve's episodic continuation of Half-Life 2, transformed into a fully roomscale Virtual Reality experience.

Return as Gordon Freeman to City 17 and deal with the consequences of your actions. Operate the gravity gun to deadly effect, battle gunships and striders and survive the darkness. Can you manage to escape City 17 with Alyx?

Features:
  • The same full room-scale VR experience you already know and love from the Half-Life 2: VR Mod, now available for Episode One!
  • Intuitive and realistic weapon interactions, with quick and easy weapon switching via a radial menu, ammo storage over your shoulder, functional iron-sights, two-handed weapons, and manual reloading. Optional laser sight and an arcade style "quick reload" are available if desired.
  • Increase your level of immersion with newly added support for bHaptics vests.
  • Playable on any VR headset which is supported by SteamVR.
  • Optional support for bHaptics vests and ProVolver haptic pistols

Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode One is a community-developed modification and was not created by Valve Software.
detailed_description:
Install requirements

You must own the original Half-Life 2 (family sharing is not sufficient). You do not need to have the non-VR version installed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires SteamVR-compatible headset and controllers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 8th gen / AMD Ryzen 3000
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires SteamVR-compatible headset and controllers.
